Translations.Text: Ware ga tenshi-tachi ni taishi,`adamu ni sajida shi nasai.' To itta toki o omoi nasai. Iburisu no soto kare-ra wa sajida shita. Daga kare wa kyohi shita
Sorede ware wa itta. `Adamu yo, hontoni kono-sha wa, anata to anata no tsuma no tekidearu. Sorede anata gata ryonin wa kono rakuen kara oidasa rete, fuko ni ochi iranai yo ki o tsuke nasai
Kokode wa, anata gata no tame ni (jubun no onmegumi ga atte) ue mo naku, hadaka ni naru koto mo nai
Mata kawaki o oboeru koto mo naku, taiyo no atsusa ni mo sarasa renai
Shikashi akuma wa kare ni sasayaite itta. `Adamu yo. Watashi wa anata ni eisei no ki to, otoroeru koto no nai oken o oshiete agemashou
Ryonin ga sore o taberu to, haji kashi tokoro ga arawa ni natta. Sore de kare-ra wa sono en no konoha de soko o oi hajimeta. Koshite adamu wa omoni somuki, go chi o okashita
Sonogo,-nushi wa kare o erabi, kaigo o yurusa re onmichibiki ni nara reta

Kare wa ose rareta. `Anata gata ryonin wa issho ni koko kara sagare. Anata-tachi wa tagaini teki de aru. Moshi anata gata ni ware kara michibiki ga kudareba, daredemo waga michibiki ni shitagau mono wa mayou koto naku, mata fuko ni ochiranaidearou
Daga dare demo, waga kunkai ni sewomukeru-sha wa, seikatsu ga kyukutsu ni nari, mata shinpan no hi ni wa momoku de yomigaera sa rerudearou
Kare wa iu. `Omo yo, watashi wa (izen) hare-gen-shadeatta no ni, naze watashi o momoku to shite yomigaera seta nodesu ka
Kare wa ose rareru. `Ware no shirushi ga anata ni kudatta toki, anata wa sore o mushi shitade wanai ka. Kyo anata wa sore to doyo mushi sa reru nodearu
Ware wa kono yo ni shite, somuita mono to omo no shirushi o shinjinakatta mono ni mukuiru. Daga raise ni okeru chobatsu wa, sarani kibishiku mata eizoku suru

Kare-ra ni wa onmichibiki wa nakatta no ka. Kare-ra yori izen ni mo ware wa don'nani oku no sedai o horoboshita koto ka. Kare-ra (kojin) no sunde ita tokoro o (ima) kare-ra wa aruite iru. Hontoni kono nakaniha richi ni tomu mono e no shirushi ga aru
